summary: A live production of the 1975 Broadway musical, "The Wiz," which put a modern spin on the classic "Wizard of Oz" tale with a cast of African-American actors.
cast: Common|Amber Riley|Uzo Aduba|Stephanie Mills|Elijah Kelley|Ne-Yo|David Alan Grier|Mary J. title: The Wiz Live!
